amendment.description: An amendment to express the sense of Congress that the United States already pays more that a proportionate share of the costs of the common defense of Europe, and that the European members of NATO should pay the bulk of the costs of NATO expansion which are incurred by existing NATO members.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by the Committee on International Relations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the International Relations amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
